a.n: Paolo Fresu 'Dentro il Vulcano' Live in Stromboli

p.k: Paolo Fresu began studying the trumpet at age 11 in his native Sardinia. After several incursions into the world of pop, Fresu fell in love with jazz in 1980, and started his professional career in 1982.
p.d: Paolo Fresu began studying the trumpet at age 11 in his native Sardinia. After several incursions into the world of pop, Fresu fell in love with jazz in 1980, and started his professional career in 1982. He recorded pieces for the RAI, the Italian radio and television, under the direction of maestro Bruno Tommaso, and took part in the seminars of Associazione Siena Jazz. During his career, Fresu has received several awards, such as Django D'Or, the prize for the best European musician and a nomination in the category of the best international musician.
